mapper.insert: insert into cart(cartMid, cartProduct, cartSellerId, cartTitle, cartPrice, cartImage, cartContent, cartInventory, cartCount) values(#{cartMid}, #{cartProduct}, #{cartSellerId}, #{cartTitle}, #{cartPrice}, #{cartImage}, #{cartContent}, #{cartInventory}, #{cartCount})
mapper.update: update cart set cartCount=#{cartCount} where cartNum=#{cartNum}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where cartMid=#{cartMid} and cartProduct=#{cartProduct};
